title: Angelina Jolie carries giant toy dinosaur as she goes shopping in Fuerteventura
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

As a mother of six children, Angelina Jolie has probably bought enough toys to kit out an entire toy store in her time.

But one more clearly didn't hurt when she was spotted shopping for a giant cuddly dinosaur over the weekend.

The actress, 44, enjoyed a shopping spree on the Spanish island of Fuerteventura on Saturday.

She looked typically glam in a peach coloured cardigan, which she wore with a chunky brown belt and a matching midi skirt.

Ange teamed the stylish look with a pair of pink muled sandals, big sunglasses and a brown handbag that she wore on her shouder.

(Image: MEGA)

She held the grey dinosaur in one hand and a huge orange shopping bag in the other.

It seemed she'd hadn't bought anything for herself, instead choosing to buy toys for her brood.

Angelina is on the island filming upcoming Marvel movie Eternals, in which she plays superhero Thena.

(Image: MEGA)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Thena is an Eternal with the powers of superhuman speed, strength, durability, regeneration,energy blasts, flight, illusion generation, matter transmutation, mind control, telekinesis, telepathy, and teleportation.

The film, which has been shot in Dunes of Corralejo, isn't due for release until 2020.

Also in the cast is Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee.

(Image: NEIL HALL/EPA-EFE/REX)

She's been joined abroad by her children Zahara, 14, and twins Knox and Vivienne, 11.

The group were recently spotted shopping at a discount shop on the island.

Angelina is also mum to Maddox, 18, Pax, 15, and Shiloh, 14.
description: The stunning actress, 44, looked chic in a peach cardigan, which she teamed with a matching skirt and chunky brown belt
